naslov: 2 SUPER LUKSUZNE vile s bazenom: Kremenje (Momjan), 301m2, LOKACIJA (prodaja)
opis: Nudi se jedinstvena prilika za kupnju dvije raskošne vile smještene u idiličnom Momjanu, tek 11 kilometara udaljenom od predivne istarske obale. Ove prekrasne kuće očaravaju sa sveukupno 6 predivnih spavaćih soba raspoređenih na 301 metru kvadratnom, na veličanstvenoj parceli od 980 kvadratnih metara. Svojom izgradnjom 2024. godine, ove vile kombiniraju suvremenu eleganciju s beskompromisnim luksuzom. Obje kuće su kompletno uređene. Svaka kuća dolazi s dva osigurana parkirna mjesta i garažom te prostranim terasama(ispred kuće, iza kuće i dvije na katu)koje pozivaju na opuštanje i uživanje u prekrasnom okruženju. U samom krajoliku nalaze se mnogobrojne vinarije(kao što su vinarija Kabola, vinarija Kozlović i dr), restorani, šetnice, trgovine kao i San servolo resort lociran 300m od kuće. Za ovaj izuzetni komfor i eleganciju, cijena za obje vile iznosi 1.250.000 €. Moguća zamjena za stan ili kuću u Zagrebu(-novogradnja na dobroj lokaciji 150 do 200m2) uz nadoplatu. A unique opportunity is offered to purchase two luxurious villas located in the idyllic village of Momjan, just 11 kilometers away from the beautiful Istrian coast. These beautiful houses charm with a total of 6 exquisite bedrooms spread over 301 square meters, on a magnificent plot of 980 square meters. Built in 2024, these villas combine contemporary elegance with uncompromising luxury. Both houses will be completely furnished and decorated. The house is expected to be completly finished by June 2024. Each house comes with two secured parking spaces + garage and a spacious terrace that invites relaxation and enjoyment of the beautiful surroundings. In the landscape itself there are numerous wineries (such as Kabola winery, Kozlović winery, etc.), restaurants, promenades, shops as well as the San servolo resort located 300m from the house. For this exceptional comfort and elegance, the price for both villas is €1,250,000. There is a possibility of exchanging the villa for a newly built apartment or house in Zagreb (150m2 to 200m2) + additional charge.
